financial_health_scorecard.methodology: Enhanced multi-dimensional financial health assessment using validated discovery data with institutional-grade evaluation criteria

float_income_channel.quantitative_estimate: 100bp rate increase adds approximately $50M annual float income
float_income_channel.significance: Partial offset to volume pressure from higher rates

mitigation_strategies: Emerging market expansion with favorable fee structures

synthesis_phase_preparation.investment_thesis_summary: Mastercard represents a high-quality payment network with exceptional financial metrics, strong competitive advantages, and attractive long-term growth prospects, trading at reasonable valuation with moderate risk profile suitable for quality growth investors.
